user.MIN_LENGTH_NAME: name must be longer or equal than 2 characters
user.MAX_LENGTH_NAME: name must be shorter or equal than 50 characters
user.INVALID_EMAIL: email must be a valid email
user.MIN_LENGTH_URL_AVATAR: urlAvatar must be longer or equal than 10 characters
user.MAX_LENGTH_URL_AVATAR: urlAvatar must shorter or equal than 250 characters
user.MIN_LENGTH_PASSWORD: password must be longer or equal than 6 characters
user.MAX_LENGTH_PASSWORD: password must be shorter or equal than 25 characters
user.MIN_SETTING_ID: settingId must not be shorter than 1
